# PDFDisplayMode.singlePageContinuous

**Case**

A display mode where the document displays in continuous mode vertically, with single-page width horizontally.

## Declaration

```swift
case singlePageContinuous
```

## Discussion

Vertical scrolling applies to the entire document.

## Constants

- **PDFDisplayMode.singlePage**: A display mode where the document displays one page at a time horizontally and vertically.
- **PDFDisplayMode.twoUp**: A display mode where the document displays two pages side-by-side.
- **PDFDisplayMode.twoUpContinuous**: A display mode where the document displays in continuous mode vertically and displays two pages side-by-side horizontally.
